Cosmic Monthly Forecast

üìñ How to Use Your Monthly Forecast

Your Cosmic Monthly Forecast weaves together four wisdom traditions to illuminate the month ahead:

  • Numerology: Your Personal Month number reveals the overarching theme, energy, and life lessons of this lunar cycle.
  • Lunar Calendar: Track the Moon's phases and signs to know the best days for action, reflection, and release.
  • Planetary Transits: Mercury's motion and other planetary influences affect communication, decisions, and timing.
  • Chinese Zodiac: Your birth year animal interacts with monthly energies, revealing hidden strengths and challenges.

Use the Week by Week overview for planning, the Lunar Calendar for daily timing, and the Synthesis for unified guidance. Let these cosmic insights inform your choices while honoring your free will.
